item.title: 'Save Me, Catch Her': Man Rescued From Krishna River After Allegedly Being Pushed By Wife
item.description:
<![CDATA['Save Me, Catch Her': Man Rescued From Krishna River After Allegedly Being Pushed By Wife
Reported By :
Edited By: Anushka Vats
Last Updated: July 13, 2025, 11:38 IST
The man, who is a resident of Shakti Nagar in Raichur, claimed that his wife pushed him into the river when they stopped to take photos on rocky outcrops.
Screengrab of video of the man in river
A man was rescued from the Krishna River after allegedly being pushed in by his wife during a photo-taking session. The incident t...]]>
item.author: Harish Upadhya

item.title: Newborn Kidnapping Foiled by Attendants at Raichur Hospital
item.description:
<![CDATA[Raichur (Karnataka), Jul 10: An alleged newborn kidnapping attempt at a government hospital in Raichur was thwarted by vigilant attendants and visitors, police reported on Thursday.
A group of individuals, purportedly dressed in saris, infiltrated the Raichur Institute of Medical Sciences (RIMS) during the early hours on Wednesday. They targeted the maternity ward on the fourth floor, taking advantage of the fact that most attendants were asleep.
One of the suspects attempted to abduct a newbo...]]>
item.author: Editorji News Desk
